QuestData.Title: The Future of Gnomeregan
QuestData.Description: It's a victory for us every time we're able to help another survivor escape from the contaminated halls of Gnomeregan. $Cs like you will play an important part in the future of Gnomeregan. To that end, our leader, High Tinker Mekkatorque, has assembled a team of trainers to help you learn your arts.$B$BXi, Friend of the Small has visited us from a faraway land and will help oversee your training and adjustment to life on the surface. She's waiting for you on the small practice field across the road.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Xi, Friend of the Small in New Tinkertown.
